com.keyboardr.glassremote.client

Interface RemoteMessenger<S,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - the type of messages this RemoteMessenger will send to the remote server. The corresponding MessageService on the remote server should receive messages as S or some superclass thereof.
    R - the type of messages this RemoteMessenger will receive from the remote server. The corresponding MessageService on the remote server should send messages as R or some subclass thereof.

    public interface RemoteMessenger<S,R>
    Interface for communicating with the remote server. There should be a MessageService<R, S> running on that remote server.
    Author:
    Joshua Brown

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  RemoteMessenger.Callback<M>
      Callback interface for RemoteMessenger.
      static class  RemoteMessenger.Factory 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disconnect()
      Disconnects from the remote server.
      boolean isConnected()
      Checks if this RemoteMessenger is connected to a remote server
      void requestConnect()
      Attempts to connect to a remote server.
      void sendMessage(S message)
      Sends a S message to the remote server.
      void setCallback(RemoteMessenger.Callback<? super R> callback)
      Sets callback destination.

    • Method Detail

      • setCallback

        void setCallback(RemoteMessenger.Callback<? super R> callback)
        Sets callback destination. Implementations should use WeakReferences to ensure the RemoteMessenger does not inadvertently keep the Callback from being GCed
        Parameters:
        callback -

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Checks if this RemoteMessenger is connected to a remote server
        Returns:
        true iff this RemoteMessenger can send and receive messages from a remote server

      • requestConnect

        void requestConnect()
        Attempts to connect to a remote server. Calls onConnected() callback if successful or onConnectionFailed() if unsuccessful

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Disconnects from the remote server. Calls onDisconnected() when finished

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(S message)
                 throws IllegalStateException
        Sends a S message to the remote server. May be called from the main thread
        Parameters:
        message - the S message to send
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the RemoteMessenger is not connected
